titleStmt.title: Of the causes and cure of sad disconsolate thoughts in Christians. By one of their sympathizing fellow-members, W. Traughton
titleStmt.author: Troughton, William, 1614?-1677?
J. D., engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Benjamin Harris, and are to be sold at his Shop, at the Stationers-Armes in Sweetings-Rents in Corn-hill, near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Includes four final contents leaves and two advertisement leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his Shop, at the Stationers-Armes in Sweetings-Rents in Corn-hill, near the Royal Exchange
